nodes.text: Epsilon 34G was an airlock on Centerpoint Station. During the Battle of Centerpoint Station of the Second Galactic Civil War, Sadras Koyan received an incoming holocomm transmission from Denjax Teppler, the Five Worlds' Minister of Information, warning him to leave the station before the Galactic Alliance could bring him to a war trial. Teppler directed him to the airlock, and told him that a shuttle would be waiting to bring Koyan to Corellia.
In actuality, Teppler was trying to get rid of Koyan. Upon reaching the airlock Koyan boarded the shuttle that was waiting there, but it turned out to be the Galactic Alliance shuttle Chinnith.
